params.contractAddress: the address of the contract represneting the edition
params.creator: the edition's owner
params.index: the identifier of newly created edition
params.payees: the number of NFTs this edition consists of

params._payees: list of addresses receiving a share
params._shares: list shares in bps, one per each address

params.index: id of splitter to get contract for

returns._0: the number of splitter instances released so far

CreatedSplitter(uint256,address,address[.notice: Emitted when a splitter is created.

constructor.notice: Initializes the factory with the address of the implementation contract template

create(address[],uint256[]).notice: Creates a new splitter contract as a factory with a deterministic address, returning the address of the newly created splitter contract. Returns the id of the created splitter contract.

get(uint256).notice: Gets a splitter given the unique identifier
